Hey, thanks for playing Island King! We've added some new stuff to the latest version:
1. 【Fruit Merchant】Trade with him & get tons of spins and coins!
2. 【Wheel Carnvial】Aquire prizes by simply spinning the wheel! 
3. 【Growing Fund】Unlock fund to boost up your gaming progress!

1.Happy Halloween, trick or treat!
2.King Pass - Your best deal of all time!
3.New tribe, new family.

【NEW】Island Discount Event

Update:
1. 【New】 The four new wheel events: Ultra Attack, Ultra Steal, Attack Partner and Steal Partner will offer you the ultimate wheel experience
2. 【New】 Tournament event: Completing tasks during the tournament and win big rewards
3. 【New】 Achievement Pack: This Pack might appear after passing 5 or 10 islands, help you finish more islands
4. 【Improvement】 You can now buy multiple Guardian Card Chests at once
5. 【Improvement】 You can send tribe invitations to your friends

Fixed issue:
1. The issue that causes the iOS island surface and the Mine interface overlapped and gets stuck after exiting

Hi, thanks for play the Island King with us, New features have come online:
1. Hammy will hold a party to celebrate the 1st anniversary.
2. The pets are all updated, you can now get stars by upgrade the pets.
3. Time to change your portrait frame and be the most shining guy!

Thanks for playing Island King!
In this version, we've implemented updates to improve your overall experience.
Enjoy a world of fun, thrills, and huge spins and coins right at your fingertips. Be sure your game is up to date so you can truly experience all there is to offer.
Invite your friends to play Island King & get your FREE REWARDS! We also recommend joining our community on Facebook, Youtube, and Instagram for more fun & excitement.
Have fun in Island King? Give us a LIKE!
